name: Strategic Tools [Notion Template]
description: ⭐️ +1.121 downloads ⭐️ FEATURED IN THE NOTION TEMPLATE GALLERY (French Version)A template with the five best strategic planning tools. If you have a new idea, project, or initiative, use this template to analyze the market, identify your strong and weak points and develop a strategy accordingly.
